languages.text: Whenever allies become targets of a Navigator power that has not targeted them this combat, they gain +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (10): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: Когда союзник становится целью силы навигатора, которая еще не применялась к нему в этом бою, этот союзник в своем следующем ходу получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} дополнительно. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Насыщение{/g} (10): союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +10 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца следующего хода навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Разрушение{/g} (6): первое применение атакующей силы навигатора за ход не входит в лимит атак на ход и не требует времени на восстановление этой силы. Второе применение этой силы или использование любой другой атакующей силы на этом ходу наносит +6 урона дополнительно всем целям, а также 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} самому навигатору. +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

traits.locale_text: Whenever allies become targets of a Navigator power that hasn't targeted them this combat, they gain +1 additional AP on their next turn. Infusing 10: Allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +10 bonus to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. Devastating 6: The first use of a damaging Navigator power does not set the power on cooldown. The second use of a Navigator power will deal an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 direct damage to the Navigator. +15 Willpower +20 Perception

Whenever allies become targets of a Navigator power that hasn't targeted them this combat, they gain +1 additional AP on their next turn. Infusing 10: Allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +10 bonus to all their characteristics until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. Devastating 6: The first use of a damaging Navigator power does not set the power on cooldown. The second use of a Navigator power will deal an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 direct damage to the Navigator. +15 Willpower +20 Perception

Whenever allies become targets of a Navigator power that has not targeted them this combat, they gain +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (10): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

languages.text: 当盟友在本场战斗中被尚未施加过的导航者能力选定为目标时，该盟友在下个回合额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}（10）：所有被导航者能力影响的盟友，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高10点，效果持续至导航者下个回合结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}（6）：每回合首次使用攻击性导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}，也不会计入每回合攻击上限。同一回合中再次使用该能力，或使用其他攻击性导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成6点伤害，导航者本人也会承受6点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。 +15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}
languages.original_text: Whenever allies become targets of a Navigator power that has not targeted them this combat, they gain +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (10): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: 当盟友在本场战斗中被尚未施加过的导航者能力选定为目标时，该盟友在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}10：所有被导航者能力影响的盟友，所有属性提高10点，效果持续至导航者下个回合结束。{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}6：首次使用伤害性的导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}。第二次使用导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成6点伤害，导航者本人也会承受6点直击伤害。 +15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}

当盟友在本场战斗中被尚未施加过的导航者能力选定为目标时，该盟友在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}灌注{/g}（10）：所有被导航者能力影响的盟友，所有{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}属性{/g}提高10点，效果持续至导航者下个回合结束。此效果可多次叠加，且每次叠加时，效果都会延长至导航者的下个回合。 {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}毁灭{/g}（6）：每回合首次使用攻击性导航者能力时，此能力不会进入{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}冷却时间{/g}，也不会计入每回合攻击上限。同一回合中再次使用该能力，或使用其他攻击性导航者能力时，会对所有目标额外造成6点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}，导航者本人也会承受6点{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直击伤害{/g}。 +15{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g} +20{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}

languages.text: 戦闘中に標的ではなかった味方が航宙士の力の標的となると、必ず次のターンで味方は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}1を増加する。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}注入{/g}：航宙士の力の標的となった味方は航宙士の次のターン終了時まで全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}特性{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}+10を獲得する。このボーナスは累積し、累積するたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。 {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}廃滅{/g}(6)：ターン毎、攻撃する航宙士の力を初めて使用する際には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は発生せず、1ターンの攻撃回数にもカウントされない。この力を2回目に使用する際、または同じターンで別の航宙士の力を使用しても、全てのターゲットに対し追加ダメージ+6、および航宙士に対して{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}6を与える。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+15増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+20増加
languages.original_text: Whenever allies become targets of a Navigator power that has not targeted them this combat, they gain +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (10): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: 戦闘中に標的ではなかった味方が航宙士の力の標的となると、必ず次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}で味方は{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}1を増加する。 {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}注入{/g}10：航宙士の力の標的となった味方は航宙士の次のターン終了時まで全ての{g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}能力{/g}に対して{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}+10を獲得する。このボーナスは累積し、累積するたびに航宙士の次のターンまで延長される。 {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}廃滅{/g}6：ターン毎、攻撃する航宙士の力を初めて使用する際には{g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}クールダウン{/g}は発生せず、1ターンの攻撃回数にもカウントされない。この力を2回目に使用する際、または同じターンで別の航宙士の力を使用しても、全てのターゲットに対し{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}追加ダメージ{/g}+6、および航宙士に対して{g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}直接ダメージ{/g}6を与える。 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}が+15増加 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}認知力{/g}が+20増加

languages.text: Cada vez que los aliados son objetivo de un poder de navegante que aún no les ha afectado este combate, ganan +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} adicional en su próximo turno. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusión{/g} (10): Los aliados objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +10 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del próximo turno del navegante. Esta bonificación se acumula y se prolonga hasta el siguiente turno del navegante cada vez que se acumula. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastación{/g} (6): El primer uso de un poder de navegante en cada turno no causa que el poder entre en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} ni cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno. El segundo uso del mismo poder o el uso de otro poder de ataque de navegante en el mismo turno inflige +6 de daño adicional a todos los objetivos y 6 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al navegante. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}
languages.original_text: Whenever allies become targets of a Navigator power that has not targeted them this combat, they gain +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (10): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que los aliados son objetivo de un poder de navegante que aún no les ha afectado este combate, ganan +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} adicional en su próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusión{/g} 10: Los aliados objetivo de los poderes del navegante reciben una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} de +10 a todas sus {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}características{/g} hasta el final del próximo turno del navegante. Esta bonificación se acumula y se prolonga hasta el siguiente turno del navegante cada vez que se acumula. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastación{/g} 6: El primer uso de un poder de navegante en cada turno no causa que el poder entre en {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}tiempo de recuperación{/g} ni cuenta para el límite de ataques por turno. El segundo uso del mismo poder o el uso de otro poder de ataque de navegante en el mismo turno inflige +6 de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} adicional a todos los objetivos y 6 de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}daño directo{/g} al navegante. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Percepción{/g}

languages.text: Когда союзник становится целью силы навигатора, которая еще не применялась к нему в этом бою, этот союзник в своем следующем ходу получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} дополнительно. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Насыщение{/g} (10): союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +10 ко всем {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}характеристикам{/g} до конца следующего хода навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Разрушение{/g} (6): первое применение атакующей силы навигатора за ход не входит в лимит атак на ход и не требует времени на восстановление этой силы. Второе применение этой силы или использование любой другой атакующей силы на этом ходу наносит +6 урона дополнительно всем целям, а также 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}прямого урона{/g} самому навигатору. +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}
languages.original_text: Whenever allies become targets of a Navigator power that has not targeted them this combat, they gain +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (10): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: Когда союзник становится целью силы навигатора, которая еще не применялась к нему в этом бою, этот союзник в своем следующем {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} дополнительно. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Насыщение{/g} 10: союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +10 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего хода навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Разрушение{/g} 6: после первого использования наносящей урон силы навигатора не требуется период {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g}. Второе использование силы навигатора наносит +6 урона дополнительно всем целям, а также 6 прямого урона самому навигатору. +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

Когда союзник становится целью силы навигатора, которая еще не применялась к нему в этом бою, этот союзник в своем следующем {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g} получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} дополнительно. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Насыщение{/g} 10: союзники, ставшие целями сил навигатора, получают {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +10 ко всем характеристикам до конца следующего хода навигатора. Этот бонус суммируется, и при каждом применении его действие продлевается до следующего хода навигатора. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Разрушение{/g} 6: после первого использования наносящей урон силы навигатора не требуется период {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}восстановления{/g}. Второе использование силы навигатора наносит +6 урона дополнительно всем целям, а также 6 прямого урона самому навигатору. +15 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воле{/g} +20 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Восприятию{/g}

languages.text: Werden Verbündete zum Ziel einer Navigatorkraft, die sie in diesem Kampf noch nicht anvisiert hat, erhalten sie für ihren nächsten Zug +1 zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Durchtränkung{/g} (10): Verbündete, die von Navigator-Kräften anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten Zuges des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +10 auf sämtliche {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Dieser Bonus ist stapelbar und wird mit jedem Stapel bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Verheerend{/g} (6): Der erste Einsatz einer Navigator-Angriffskraft in jedem Zug aktiviert die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} der Kraft nicht und fließt nicht in das Angriffslimit pro Zug ein. Der zweite Einsatz dieser Kraft oder der Einsatz einer anderen Navigator-Angriffskraft im selben Zug fügt allen Zielen zusätzlich +6 Schaden und dem Navigator 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zu. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}
languages.original_text: Whenever allies become targets of a Navigator power that has not targeted them this combat, they gain +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (10): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn Verbündete zum Ziel einer Navigatorkraft werden, die sie in diesem Kampf noch nicht anvisiert hat, erhalten sie in ihrem nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} +1 zusätzlichen {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Durchtränkung{/g} 10: Verbündete, die von den Kräften des Navigators anvisiert werden, erhalten bis zum Ende des nächsten Zugs des Navigators einen {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +10 auf alle ihre {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}Eigenschaften{/g}. Dieser Bonus ist stapelbar und wird jedes Mal, wenn er sich stapelt, bis zum nächsten Zug des Navigators verlängert. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Verheerend{/g} 6: Der erste Einsatz einer Navigator-Angriffskraft in jedem Zug aktiviert die {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}Abklingzeit{/g} der Kraft nicht und zählt nicht zum Angriffslimit pro Zug. Der zweite Einsatz dieser Kraft oder der Einsatz einer anderen Navigator-Angriffskraft im selben Zug fügt allen Zielen zusätzlich +6 {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} und dem Navigator 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}Direktschaden{/g} zu. <indent=5%>+15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} <indent=5%>+20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Wahrnehmung{/g}

languages.text: Chaque fois que des alliés sont ciblés par un pouvoir du navigateur pour la première fois au cours d'un combat, ils bénéficient de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} supplémentaire lors du tour suivant. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Imprégnation{/g} 10 : les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} de tous les alliés ciblés par des pouvoirs du navigateur obtiennent un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +10 jusqu'à la fin du tour suivant du navigateur. Ce bonus est cumulable et est prolongé à chaque cumul jusqu'au prochain tour du navigateur. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Dévastation{/g} (6) : à chaque tour, la première utilisation d'un pouvoir offensif du navigateur ne déclenche pas le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de ce pouvoir et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour. La deuxième utilisation de ce pouvoir ou d'un autre pouvoir offensif du navigateur au cours du même tour inflige +6 points de dégâts supplémentaires à toutes les cibles et 6 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} au navigateur. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
languages.original_text: Whenever allies become targets of a Navigator power that has not targeted them this combat, they gain +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (10): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

traits.locale_text: Chaque fois que des alliés sont ciblés par un pouvoir du navigateur pour la première fois au cours d'un combat, ils bénéficient de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} supplémentaire lors du tour suivant. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Imprégnation{/g} 10 : les {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}caractéristiques{/g} de tous les alliés ciblés par des pouvoirs du navigateur obtiennent un {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de +10 jusqu'à la fin du tour suivant du navigateur. Ce bonus est cumulable et est prolongé à chaque cumul jusqu'au prochain tour du navigateur. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Dévastation{/g} (6) : à chaque tour, la première utilisation d'un pouvoir offensif du navigateur ne déclenche pas le {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}temps de recharge{/g} de ce pouvoir et n'est pas déduite du nombre maximum d'attaques par tour. La deuxième utilisation de ce pouvoir ou d'un autre pouvoir offensif du navigateur au cours du même tour inflige +6 points de dégâts supplémentaires à toutes les cibles et 6 points de {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}dégâts directs{/g} au navigateur. +15 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} +20 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}

languages.text: Bir dost birim, o çatışmada daha önce hedefi olmadığı bir Rotacı gücünün hedefi olduğunda bir sonraki turunda +1 ilave {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} kazanır. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Aşılayıcı{/g} (10): Rotacı güçlerinin hedef aldığı dost birimler, tüm {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}niteliklerine{/g} +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} alırlar. Bu etki, Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turunun sonuna dek sürer. Bu bonus üst üste birikir ve her yeni birikimde etki süresi Rotacı'nın bir sonraki turuna dek uzar. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Yıkıcı{/g} (6): Saldırı amaçlı bir Rotacı gücünün bir turdaki ilk kullanımı, gücü {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}dolum süresine{/g} sokmaz ve tur başına saldırı sınırından sayılmaz. Aynı turda bu gücün ikinci kez veya saldırı amaçlı başka bir Rotacı gücünün kullanımı, tüm hedeflere +6 ilave hasar verirken Rotacı da 6 puan {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}doğrudan hasara{/g} maruz kalır. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Algı{/g}
languages.original_text: Whenever allies become targets of a Navigator power that has not targeted them this combat, they gain +1 additional {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} on their next turn. {g|Encyclopedia:Infusing}Infusing{/g} (10): allies targeted by Navigator powers gain a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all their {g|Encyclopedia:Characteristic}characteristics{/g} until the end of the Navigator's next turn. This bonus stacks and is prolonged until the Navigator's next turn every time it stacks. {g|Encyclopedia:Devastating}Devastating{/g} (6): the first use of an attacking Navigator power per turn does not set the power on {g|Encyclopedia:Cooldown}cooldown{/g} and does not count toward the attack limit per turn. The second use of this power or the use of a different attacking Navigator power on the same turn deals an additional +6 damage to all targets and 6 {g|Encyclopedia:DirectDamage}direct damage{/g} to the Navigator. +15 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} +20 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}Perception{/g}
